title: You dare lie to me riot?!?!?!?!?!?!?!??!
body: "Permanent return of the mystery chest" LIES ITS GONE. WHY WHY WHY I GIVE SO MUCH MONEY TO THE MYSTERY CHEST WHY RIOT WHY ITS GOING TO BE ANOTHER 20 YEARS BEFORE YOU BRING IT BACK OUT AGAIN! [If you put Vel'Koz on sale along with his Arclight skin I'd forgive you <3]
